question: Which among the following is not true regarding the 42nd Amendment act 1976 which is also called a Mini Constitution of India?
option1: The amendments were mainly to give effect to the recommendation of Swaran Singh Committee
option2: The words Liberty , Equality & Fraternity were added in the constitution
option3: Fundamental duties of the citizens added
option4: Directive principles of state policy were extended
answer: The words Liberty , Equality & Fraternity were added in the constitution
explanation: Secular, Socialist & Integrity were the terms added to the constitution
